ðŸ¤˜ **Closed issues**
- Whistle restart application without crashing https://github.com/hyperoslo/Whisper/issues/68

- Hiding whisper breaks when used with other UIWindows (such as GoogleMobileAds). https://github.com/hyperoslo/Whisper/issues/156

- Swift 4  https://github.com/hyperoslo/Whisper/issues/178

- Improves the shout view by increasing the touch area #132
- The height constraint is now made public on `WhisperView` #153

name: 4.0.0 - Swift 3
body:
The Swift 3 version of Whisper is here!

This release also includes:
- 2 lines of text in shouts! #102 
- Variable size shouts! #108 

Thanks to everyone to make this release possible. :)

- Update README
- Update file target memebership

- Fix strong reference https://github.com/hyperoslo/Whisper/pull/93
- Rename global function https://github.com/hyperoslo/Whisper/pull/104
- Fix duration parameter in calm https://github.com/hyperoslo/Whisper/pull/107

name: 3.0.0 - Permanent whistle

body: This includes minor improvements across thank's to our contributors. :)
- Add configuration to disable modification of inset #49 #48 #47

This is a minor bug-fix release
- Fix Whisper modifying the top offset if it is being dismissed in a controller that was not modified by Whisper [#47](https://github.com/hyperoslo/Whisper/pull/47/files)

This version introduces a breaking change for the public API in `Message`'s.
The label `color` is now called `backgroundColor`.
- Fixes `Murmur`'s not using duration - [#38](https://github.com/hyperoslo/Whisper/pull/38), [@duemunk](https://github.com/duemunk)
- Fix Whistle messing with status bar appearance [#39](https://github.com/hyperoslo/Whisper/pull/39/), [@duemunk](https://github.com/duemunk)
- Whispers now supports setting text color [#44](https://github.com/hyperoslo/Whisper/pull/44)

A special thanks goes out to [@duemunk](https://github.com/duemunk) for smashing some bugs that had snuck itself into **Whisper**

This release includes various fixes that you can find in the issues.
- Shout now supports color.
- Movement orientations improved.
- Improved the encapsulation of some intern code.

Special thank's to @burntheroad and @NachoSoto for their PRs, keep rocking! :)
